title: Whiskeytown National Recreation Area: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking for more information about Whiskeytown NRA? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.   News For current information about Whiskeytown National Recreation Area through news releases and the park newspaper.   Photos & Multimedia Curious about what's happening on the lake today? Check out the park webcam! This camera is located on the roof of the park visitor center and looks west over Whiskeytown Lake.  Made possible, in part, by Whiskeytown Sailing Club, through a generous donation to the Friends of Whiskeytown.   Nature Learn how the the National Park Service is conserving its biodiversity and how you too can help conserve biodiversity.   Education Enhance your students' education with a visit to the ultimate classroom, Whiskeytown National Recreation Area. Entrance fees may be waived for school groups and other bona fide academic institutions.  Kids & Youth Help preserve and protect Whiskeytown National Recreation Area while still earning your junior ranger badge! Pick up a scavenger hunt at the Visitor Center.  Management The Whiskeytown Unit of Whiskeytown - Shasta - Trinity National Recreation Area is the only unit administered by the National Park Service.  Bookstore When you visit Whiskeytown, stop by our bookstore operated by Western National Parks Association. You'll find books on natural and cultural histories, children's books, maps, field guides and a wide range of other useful information.    Publications Download, view and print publications, or stop by the visitor center to pick one up.
